title: iHeartRadio Bonus Herd Episode
itunes:title: iHeartRadio Bonus Herd Episode
description:
A bonus Herd episode has just been posted exclusively in iHeartRadio! Enjoy Colin chatting with College Football Insider Bruce Feldman on Ed Orgeron & LSU’s Championship Run.

 

Listen to the conversation by clicking here.

 

In this bonus episode Colin & Bruce Feldman discuss how eccentric personality Ed Orgeron always manages to flip the script. How disappointments have fueled incredible success and how he’s picked himself off the mat from rock bottom situations in his life. Colin & Bruce also discuss whether Lincoln Riley will get the urge to coach in the NFL and whether Nick Saban will get the urge to retire. 

 

This bonus interview is available exclusively in the iHeartRadio app. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
